import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { ReactComponent as Logo } from '../../assets/crown.svg' import { auth } from '../../firebase/firebase.utils' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import './header.styles.scss' const Header = (props) => (
SHOP CONTACT { currentUser ?
auth.signOut()}>SIGN OUT
: SIGN IN }
) const mapStateToProps = (state) => ({ currentUser: state.user.currentUser }) export default connect(mapStateToProps)(Header)
